page.title: 02Childrens Games
page.content: A favourite{playground game}is called {Queenball.}There are four players and plenty of reserves.There is a Queen and he or she has to hit the ball to one of the other three players who must hit it to another player.The object of the game is to get the Queen out so a new Queen can go in.One of the rules is that if the ball bounces twice in your square, then you are out.You may hit the ball with any part of your body.Queenball is played on a court marked out with four small squares and two large rectangles for the reserves to stand in.When the Queen is out, then the King moves to the Queen's square, the Jack moves to the vacant King's square, the Ace moves to the Jack's position and a new player from the reserves moves onto the empty square.
